relationships.description: Harry is hearing two voices arguing as they climb the steps up to the Owlery.
Hermione suddenly says 'Shh!' and interrupts the conversation between Harry and the other two voices.
The Ministry of Magic is connected to the Owlery, as something that would not be wanted to be known about by someone who has done something wrong.
Harry is aware of the Ministry of Magic and its connection to the Owlery, as he hears the conversation between the two voices.
Hermione is also aware of the Ministry of Magic and its connection to the Owlery, as she interrupts the conversation between Harry and the other two voices.
Harry is aware of Hermione's connection to the Ministry of Magic, as he hears her interrupting the conversation between him and the other two voices.
